column4: /dev/sda5    seems to be where you installed ubuntu to, so that is hd0,4 in grub naming scheme
so the line in grub to do ubuntu the default option should be something like  install (hd0,4)/boot/grub/stage1 (hd0)

I forget. i rarely have to mess with grub.  i would suggest rereading the 'restoring grub after you install windows' docs closely.   most lilkely you can boot  the live cd and chroot over (or somthing) and do a 'grub-install hd0'
or 'install (hd0) from the grub 'command line' ' perhaps
